Practice_Description: Limit information system access to authorized users and devices.
Limit system access to the types of transactions and functions authorized.
Verify and control/limit connections to external systems.
Control public information posted or accessible online.
Use secure methods to authenticate users.
Sanitize or destroy information system media before disposal/reuse.
Limit physical access to systems and equipment.
Escort visitors and monitor visitor activity.
Maintain audit logs of physical access.
Monitor and control communications at system boundaries.
Implement protections for publicly accessible systems.
Update antivirus and malware defenses regularly.
Protect against spam and unauthorized messages.
